name: Stick (mill-ooh-ski)
description:
You're a stick figure navigating levels drawn on paper. That's it.

NOTE: I highly suggest checking out the Readme file. It is the only way to learn the game's controls.

ALSO NOTE: I have not tested the Linux and MacOS versions of the game so I am not sure if they will work properly. If anybody has any problems with those two versions, please let me know.
